content.rendered:
Trevor is an Associate Academic Assessor Business at Regent College London. He has been teaching HND for 7 years & ILM (Level 6) in Social Enterprise & London Centre of Marketing (Level 6) for 4 years. Prior to teaching, he worked at Reuters for 16 years in various posts such as Commissioning Engineer, Project Engineer & Senior Planning Engineer in ‘Information Technology’.

Courses taught

HND in Business: Innovation; Entrepreneurship; Marketing; Strategy; Understanding and Leading Change; Human Resource Management; Organisational Behaviour; Study Skills & Personal Development.
